org.uqbar.commons.model

Class ObservableUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.uqbar.commons.model.ObservableUtils

  • public class ObservableUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for Observable object functions, for example to force triggering a property change method.
    Author:
    jfernandes, flbulgarelli

    • Method Detail

      • dependencyOf

        public static void dependencyOf(Object model,
                String property,
                String... dependencies)
        Set ups one or more dependencies for the given property in the given model. That is, the property property will fire a propertyChanged event whenever any of the dependencies get updated.
        Parameters:
        model - the model with the given properties
        property - the property to which dependencies will be added
        dependencies - the the dependencies to be added to the given property
        Since:
        3.4

      • firePropertyChanged

                       String propertyName,
                       Object newValue)
